import React from 'react' import SpeakerFavoriteButton from '../SpeakerFavoriteButton/SpeakerFavoriteButton' import SpeakerImage from '../SpeakerImage/SpeakerImage' const Speaker = ({id, firstName, lastName, isFavorite, bio}) => (
{`${speaker.firstName} ${speaker.lastName}`}
{speaker.bio.substr(0, 70) + '...'}
); export default Speaker;
